summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 22nd Avenue Northeast, from East 63rd Street to East 65th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 89738, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
